mapper.select: SELECT tid, msnum, id, title, bdate, sdate, edate, theater, snum, price FROM TICKET WHERE ID=#{id} AND sdate > NOW() ORDER BY sdate;
SELECT tid, msnum, id, title, bdate, sdate, edate, theater, snum, price FROM TICKET WHERE ID=#{id} AND NOW() >= sdate ORDER BY sdate DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TICKET(tid, msnum, id, title, bdate, sdate, edate, theater, snum, price ) VALUES(#{tid},#{msnum},#{id},#{title}, NOW(),#{sdate},#{edate},#{theater},#{snum},#{price})
